name: Remember Me (itch) (TheUsualCam)
description:
An interactive experience demo I created during my third term at university.

I do not own any of the visual or audio assets, but all programming and project development was completed by me.

Uploading as a portfolio piece but feel free to play!

REMEMBER ME

Jonothan Cross was involved in a serious accident, and has been left in a coma due to severe damage to his brain. With the help of a mysterious cat, Messorem, he must traverse the doors of his mind in search of Mementos in order to reclaim all of his lost memories.
